name: latch
description: A modern, local-only SSH manager with encrypted import/export

scripts.dev: cd apps/desktop && npm run tauri dev
scripts.build: cd apps/desktop && npm run tauri build
scripts.build:all: cd apps/desktop && npm run tauri build -- --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --target x86_64-apple-darwin --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:windows: cd apps/desktop && npm run tauri build -- --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.build:macos: cd apps/desktop && npm run tauri build -- --target x86_64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:linux: cd apps/desktop && npm run tauri build -- --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
